movies.title: Jeong Seung Pil Mystery
movies.originalTitle: The Weird Missing Case of Mr. J
movies.plot: (Korean with English subtitles) When bumbling fund manager Jeong Seung-Pil suddenly disappears one day, his seductive fiancÃ© becomes the no.1 suspect in the investigation. A mad dash ensues when the whole nation is looking for Seung-pil.
movies.simplePlot: (Korean with English subtitles) When bumbling fund manager Jeong Seung-Pil suddenly disappears one day, his seductive fiancÃ© becomes the no.1 suspect in the investigation. A mad dash ensues when the whole nation is looking for Seung-pil.

biography.bio: Gyu-ri Kim was born on August 16, 1979 in Seoul, South Korea. She is an actress, known for Memento Mori (1999), Portrait of a Beauty (2008) and La pègre (2004).
biography.name: Gyu-ri Kim

biography.bio: Kwang-gyu Kim is an actor, known for Tazza: The High Rollers (2006), North Korean Guys (2003) and Voice of a Murderer (2007).
biography.name: Kwang-gyu Kim

biography.bio: Roe-ha Kim was born on November 15, 1965 in Gyeonggi-do, South Korea. He is an actor, known for Memories of Murder (2003), Hindsight (2011) and A Little Pond (2009).
biography.name: Roe-ha Kim

biography.bio: Beom-su Lee was born on January 3, 1970 in Chungju, South Korea. He is an actor, known for Lifting King Kong (2009), Operation Chromite (2016) and Iris (2009). He has been married to Yoon-jin Lee since May 22, 2010. They have two children.
biography.name: Beom-su Lee

biography.bio: Han-wi Lee is an actor, known for War of the Arrows (2011), Christmas in August (1998) and 200 Pounds Beauty (2006).
biography.name: Han-wi Lee

biography.bio: Won-jong Lee was born on December 12, 1966 in South Korea. He is an actor, known for Vampire Prosecutor (2011), 200 Pounds Beauty (2006) and Attack the Gas Station! (1999).
biography.name: Won-jong Lee

biography.bio: Dae-ho Lim is an actor, known for Jeong Seung Pil Mystery (2009), Jeong Do-jeon (2014) and Working Mom (2008).
biography.name: Dae-ho Lim

biography.bio: Chang-min Son was born on April 24, 1965 in Pusan, South Korea. He is an actor, known for All That Falls Has Wings (1990), The Medical Brothers (1997) and Silver Stallion (1991).
biography.name: Chang-min Son
